timeline.message:
StringFirstAggregatorFactory: Fix incorrect "combine" method.

There was a test, but it was wrong.

timeline.bodyText: Shouldn't this extend InitializedNullHandlingTest ? I think NullHandlingTest is an actual test... I always get confused between these 2
timeline.author: suneet-s
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -38,7 +39,7 @@
 
 import java.nio.ByteBuffer;
 
-public class StringFirstAggregationTest
+public class StringFirstAggregationTest extends NullHandlingTest
